name: Robot Killer Escape
description:
Robot Killer Escape is a FREE retro action platformer adventure game!

Entertaining gameplay, hours of fun guaranteed!

Find the key to unlock next level, avoid enemies and obstacles and find your way out!

Get through all 24 rooms to complete the game - but be careful - it is not as easy as it looks! You will get hooked on this game!

Help the blue robot killer to jump up and down with just an easy touch.

Get bonus points by collecting coins and get ranked in the leaderboard.

Robot Killer Escape is waiting for you - download now and share with friends!

If you love robots and transformers you will love this game!
